ComicInfo.Summary:
Juliette may have the incredible power of a Hexenbiest, but not the control that can allow her to trust herself, and when her and Rosalee’s investigation into a string of murderous Wesen art thefts requires intimidation, who better to take lead than the one Grimm left in Portland, Trubel!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mary Sanapo | 1 | B | "Mask" Cover B | Kyle Strahm | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Mary Sanapo | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Mary Sanapo | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 22:29:31. [CVDB553031]
ComicInfo.Characters: Drew Wu, Juliette Silverton, Nick Burkhardt, Rosalee Calvert, Truble
